interface.name: zqt_vulkan_server_buffer_v1

description.summary: Internal protocol for buffer sharing using Vulkan external memory

interface.description:
This protocol is used internally by Qt for implementing the qt_server_buffer extension on hardware that supports Vulkan external memory .
This protocol is not part of the Qt API. It exists purely as an implementation detail and may change from version to version without notice, or even be removed.

event.name: server_buffer_created
event.description: Informs the client about a newly created server buffer. The "fd" argument is a POSIX file descriptor representing the underlying resources of a Vulkan device memory object as defined in the GL_EXT_memory_object_fd extension.
